author: pamarcelot
msg: Fix for DIRSTUDIO-601 (The 'Perform Search/Search Again' button in the Search Result Editor does not work correctly).
The previous fix was breaking things, especially the Quick Search.
This new fix should not break anything.

author: dag
msg: This patch, derby-4387, fixes a corner case of the closure code in
which the outer and the inner table is the same. This led to adding
the same, new predicate twice to the same table, causing the infinite
loop. The patch also adds a test case, which, without the fix, shows

author: tommaso
msg: UIMA-1694 : developerConnection url must contain https, not http
